nodes.text: The Trigdale refinery was built on Seregar by Trigdale Metallurgy to process tolium. The facility was abandoned when the mining consortium pulled out of the planet.

The refinery was a massive maze of rooms, corridors, pipes and catwalks. While it was still painted the color red for the corporate colors of Trigdale, much of the exterior was rusted and faded with vines and creepers growing over it.
